# iRss

The `iRss` package is being developed by the IRSS lab to provide useful functions
members use to do their work.

```{r, fig.align = "right", out.width="25%", echo=FALSE}
knitr::include_graphics("man/Logo/iRsshex.jpg")
```
## Installation

You can install the development version of iRss like so:

``` r
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("https://github.com/tgoodbody/iRss")
library(iRss)
```
